page.title: 18Home Life
page.content: Most people work for five days a week from nine 'till five and have weekends free. Evenings are often spent watching T.V. but some people play sports, go swimming, fishing or to badminton. Gardening takes up quite a bit of time as does D.I.Y. home improvement, car washing, cooking and shopping. Children spend quite a lot of time with their home computers. In our school 60% of children have computers of their own. Homes usually have central heating, mainly oil and gas. Double glazing and energy saving plans are popular. Most houses are modern and have three bedrooms, a garage and a small garden. Small cars are popular and generally are not much more than five years old.
